main.head: Printable Resources
The Fridays For Future Logo
main.p: Our logo (.svg version) can be used freely by our strikers. You can even add your strike’s location to the logo, and if you need any assistance, please use the FFF Germany ToolPic Generator and a new one.
Important: the FFF logo may not be used for commercial purposes or by political parties!
